title: He Hates Me Not
description: Once upon a time, there was a girl.She hid secrets and scars behind a blinding smile.Until I decided to confiscate that smile, watch it, trap it, own it.She calls it an obsession, a madness, but sheâ€™s seen nothing.The moment I noticed her, her fate was sealed.Then she became a key player in my unhinged game.Once upon a time, there was a girl, a liar, a fraud.Mine.This is book is a dark stalker romance and contains dubious scenes.He Hates Me Not is the second part of a duet and is NOT a standalone.
author: Isabella Starling
